wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi Holly, and thank you for the offer to help with the Catharsis release. I'll be relnasieg CATHARSIS, Legend of the Lemurians (Earth Keepers Chronicles: Book 1), on 9/13, and would certainly appreciate your mentions/tweets about that. I will have a blog post about the release and about the Catharsis Reader Appreciation Promo, starting 9/13.If you read this type of stories (it's YA dystopian/visionary fantasy), I am presently sending out ARC's to my reviewers, and I'd certainly be honored it you were one of my first reviewers. But no pressure whatsoever.If you'd like that, I can send you ARC for your consideration. Please let me know here or by Twitter DM.Thanks so much and cheers!Congrats on your new awards! You deserve them Lada

item.title: In Dress
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: This chair, I decided to put "dress" thanks to which the chair began to look elegant. The frame is made of solid ash. "Dress" has decorative buttons and loops that highlight its beauty. The chair was very soft and comfortable, and most importantly - it is eco - product.
